suite.name: 01 Check-Email

kw.name: Setup Test Suite
Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=api_session, url=http://localhost:20000/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Connect To Postgres
Connect To Database
kw.msg: Connect to DB using : psycopg2.connect(database='investor', user='username', password=***, host='localhost', port=25432)
kw.doc: Creates a database connection using the DB API 2.0 ``db_module`` and the parameters provided. Along with listed commonly used arguments (`db_name`, `db_host` etc.) you can set any other DB module specific parameters as key/value pairs.
Centralizes the database connection by parsing the URL

kw.name: Execute Postgres
Execute Sql String
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
TRUNCATE TABLE "user" CASCADE;
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` - as a single SQL command (default) or as separate statements.
Executes a query and returns the result

kw.name: Delete All Emails From Mailbox
Connect To Mailbox
Open Mailbox
kw.doc: Open IMAP email client session to given ``host`` with given ``user`` and ``password``.
Centralizes the mailbox opening

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Delete All Emails
kw.doc: Delete all emails.
Runs the specified keyword and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Close Mailbox
kw.doc: Close IMAP email client session.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.
Cleans the inbox to avoid state interference
Initializes API session and cleans IMAP inbox

test.name: Should Throw When Email In Use

kw.name: Register New Account
Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:20000/auth/register path_url=/auth/register headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '89', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "test_rjlvixdgko@email.com", "password": "Test@123", "name": "User rjlvixdgko"}'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:20000/auth/register status=201, reason=Created headers={'Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy': 'same-origin', 'Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy': 'same-origin', 'Origin-Agent-Cluster': '?1', 'Referrer-Policy': 'no-referrer', 'Strict-Transport-Security': 'max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains', 'X-Content-Type-Options': 'nosniff', 'X-DNS-Prefetch-Control': 'off', 'X-Download-Options': 'noopen', 'X-Frame-Options': 'SAMEORIGIN', 'X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies': 'none', 'X-XSS-Protection': '0', 'vary': 'Origin', 'x-request-id': '019c26a7-b4cb-72c9-8600-5a2b9a905b3c', 'content-length': '0', 'Date': 'Wed, 04 Feb 2026 03:17:30 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=72'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
Registers user and returns random email

kw.name: Do Check
GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:20000/auth/check/email/test_rjlvixdgko@email.com path_url=/auth/check/email/test_rjlvixdgko@email.com headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
Checks if email is in use

test.name: Should Return When Email Not In Use

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Do Check
GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:20000/auth/check/email/test_xdiyukanhc@email.com path_url=/auth/check/email/test_xdiyukanhc@email.com headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://localhost:20000/auth/check/email/test_xdiyukanhc@email.com status=204, reason=No Content headers={'Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy': 'same-origin', 'Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy': 'same-origin', 'Origin-Agent-Cluster': '?1', 'Referrer-Policy': 'no-referrer', 'Strict-Transport-Security': 'max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains', 'X-Content-Type-Options': 'nosniff', 'X-DNS-Prefetch-Control': 'off', 'X-Download-Options': 'noopen', 'X-Frame-Options': 'SAMEORIGIN', 'X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies': 'none', 'X-XSS-Protection': '0', 'vary': 'Origin', 'x-request-id': '019c26a7-b511-774f-8a35-d4b2884be013', 'Date': 'Wed, 04 Feb 2026 03:17:31 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=72'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
Checks if email is in use

kw.name: Teardown Test Suite
Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects

kw.name: Disconnect From Postgres
Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.
Centralizes the database disconnection
Closes all sessions

suite.doc: Account registration suite using shared resources
